MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 29-NOV-2020 18:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G41 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Terregles Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 10:18AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties. To enable us to work on a permanent repair to our electrical equipment at Terragle Crescent you will experience another supply interruption once additional resources arrive  onsite. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6PM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:10PM on 29 November 2020.
